name: Project XLR
description:
You  want to go to an adventure and see the world how it is for real, in Project XLR you  go into an adventure to explore the world, you will meet friends, fight enemies and so much more

Setting Up Project XLR is Easy, Just Run the Game and It Will Load, No need to create file, It auto-creates a savefile using your PC username and haves a save system

Every Set Includes the same story but extended

 

SetIncludes Game?How to GetStatusBasicYesFreeDevelopmentDeluxeYesKey OnlyNo Progress
